generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, curving to the right, which is characteristic of a road.
- vegetation: There are numerous trees and greenery lining the sides of the road and in the background, which are forms of vegetation.
- person: Two individuals are visible walking on the side of the road in the distance.
- bus: A large, cream-colored bus with blue stripes and text is prominently visible on the road, clearly identifiable as a bus.
- truck: A white truck with "ULUSOY LOGISTICS" written on its side is visible in the background, partially obscured by trees and a bridge structure.
- building: A building with scaffolding is visible in the upper left corner of the image, behind the truck.
- pole: Several poles are visible along the roadside, including one near the railway tracks and another supporting a traffic sign.
- traffic sign: A circular traffic sign is visible on a pole near the center of the image, and a rectangular sign is visible on the left side of the road near the railway tracks.
- terrain: The area beside the road, including the railway tracks and the grassy verge, is covered in grass and soil, which is terrain.
- sky: A small portion of the sky is visible at the top left corner of the image, above the trees and building.
